verses.text: Moreover \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* \w separated|strong="H0914"\w* to the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*, and of \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w*, and of \w Jeduthun|strong="H3038"\w*, who should \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* with \w harps|strong="H3658"\w*, with \w psalteries|strong="H5035"\w*, and with \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w*: and the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w workmen|strong="H0582"\w* according to their \w service|strong="H5656"\w* was:

Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*; \w Zaccur|strong="H2139"\w*, and \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, and \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w*, and \w Asarelah|strong="H0841"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w* under the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*, which \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* according to the \w order|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 25.2 \ft Asarelah: otherwise called Jesharelah\f*\f + \fr 25.2 \ft according…: Heb. by the hands of the king\f*

Of \w Jeduthun|strong="H3038"\w*: the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeduthun|strong="H3038"\w*; \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w*, and \w Zeri|strong="H6874"\w*, and \w Jeshaiah|strong="H3470"\w*, \w Hashabiah|strong="H2811"\w*, and \w Mattithiah|strong="H4993"\w*, \w six|strong="H8337"\w*, under the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of their \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w Jeduthun|strong="H3038"\w*, who \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* with a \w harp|strong="H3658"\w*, to give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* and to \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 25.3 \ft Zeri: or, Izri\f*

Of \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w*: the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w*; \w Bukkiah|strong="H1232"\w*, \w Mattaniah|strong="H4983"\w*, \w Uzziel|strong="H5816"\w*, \w Shebuel|strong="H7619"\w*, and \w Jerimoth|strong="H3406"\w*, \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w*, \w Hanani|strong="H2607"\w*, \w Eliathah|strong="H0448"\w*, \w Giddalti|strong="H1437"\w*, and \w Romamti-ezer|strong="H7320"\w*, \w Joshbekashah|strong="H3436"\w*, \w Mallothi|strong="H4413"\w*, \w Hothir|strong="H1956"\w*, \add and\add* \w Mahazioth|strong="H4238"\w*:\f + \fr 25.4 \ft Uzziel: also called, Azareel\f*\f + \fr 25.4 \ft Shebuel: also called, Shubael\f*

All these \add were\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w seer|strong="H2374"\w* in the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to lift \w up|strong="H7311"\w* the \w horn|strong="H7161"\w*. And \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* to \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w* \w fourteen|strong="H0702"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*.\f + \fr 25.5 \ft words: or, matters\f*

All these \add were\add* under the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of their \w father|strong="H0001"\w* for \w song|strong="H7892"\w* \add in\add* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, with \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w*, \w psalteries|strong="H5035"\w*, and \w harps|strong="H3658"\w*, for the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, according to the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w order|strong="H3027"\w* to \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*, \w Jeduthun|strong="H3038"\w*, and \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w*.\f + \fr 25.6 \ft according…: Heb. by the hands of the king\f*

So the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of them, with their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* that were \w instructed|strong="H3925"\w* in the \w songs|strong="H7892"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add even\add* all that were \w cunning|strong="H0995"\w*, was two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* and \w eight|strong="H8083"\w*.

¶ And they \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \w lots|strong="H1486"\w*, \w ward|strong="H4931"\w* \w against|strong="H5980"\w* \add ward\add*, as well the \w small|strong="H6996"\w* as the \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, the \w teacher|strong="H0995"\w* as the \w scholar|strong="H8527"\w*.

Now the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* for \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w* to \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*: the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* to \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w*, who with his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* and \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:
The \w third|strong="H7992"\w* to \w Zaccur|strong="H2139"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:
The \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* to \w Izri|strong="H3339"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:
The \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* to \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:
The \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* to \w Bukkiah|strong="H1232"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:
The \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* to \w Jesharelah|strong="H3480"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:
The \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* to \w Jeshaiah|strong="H3470"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:
The \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w* to \w Mattaniah|strong="H4983"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:
The \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* to \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:
The \w eleventh|strong="H6249"\w* to \w Azareel|strong="H5832"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:
The \w twelfth|strong="H8147"\w* to \w Hashabiah|strong="H2811"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:
The \w thirteenth|strong="H7969"\w* to \w Shubael|strong="H7619"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:
The \w fourteenth|strong="H0702"\w* to \w Mattithiah|strong="H4993"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:
The \w fifteenth|strong="H2568"\w* to \w Jeremoth|strong="H3406"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:
The \w sixteenth|strong="H8337"\w* to \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:

The \w seventeenth|strong="H7651"\w* to \w Joshbekashah|strong="H3436"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:
The \w eighteenth|strong="H8083"\w* to \w Hanani|strong="H2607"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:
The \w nineteenth|strong="H8672"\w* to \w Mallothi|strong="H4413"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:
The \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* to \w Eliathah|strong="H0448"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:

The \w one|strong="H0259"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* to \w Hothir|strong="H1956"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:

The \w two|strong="H8147"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* to \w Giddalti|strong="H1437"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:

The \w three|strong="H7969"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* to \w Mahazioth|strong="H4238"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*:

The \w four|strong="H0702"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* to \w Romamti-ezer|strong="H7320"\w*, \add he\add*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*.
